step1.welcome: Welcome to your new blog journey.
step1.title: Appearance
step1.description: Customize how your blog looks and feels.

step2.title: Site Information
step2.description: This information will be displayed on the browser tab and at the bottom of the page.

siteTitle.label: Site Title
siteTitle.hint: Displayed in browser tabs and search results, this is your website's name

siteIcon.label: Site Icon
siteIcon.help1: Recommended to use 256x256 or larger PNG/ICO files

footer.label: Footer Copyright
footer.hint: Displayed at the bottom of every page, typically used for copyright notices

icp.label: ICP Filing Number
icp.hint: According to Chinese law, if your server is located in mainland China, you must display the ICP filing number

step3.title: Create Admin
step3.description: Create your administrator account to log in and manage your blog.

email.label: Email Address
email.hint: After configuring SMTP, the system may send notifications to this email

step4.title: Personalization
step4.description: Make your blog unique by uploading an avatar and home page banner for key locations.

personalization.title: Enable Personalization
personalization.description: Enabling this allows you to set an admin avatar and home page background.

avatar.label: Admin Avatar
avatar.description: Displayed in the homepage sidebar, recommended size 256x256 pixels.

hero.label: Home Page Banner
hero.description: This is your front door, displayed at the top of the home page.

step5.title: Email Notifications
step5.description: Configure SMTP service to enable your blog to send email notifications.

smtp.title: Enable SMTP
smtp.description: Enable this to configure email server for sending comment notifications, system messages, etc.

password.label: SMTP Password
password.placeholder: Enter SMTP password or app password

auth.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address

appearance.hue_range: Hue must be a number between 0 and 360
appearance.language_invalid: Language must be zh-CN or en-US

site_info.title_range: Site title is required and must be under 100 characters
site_info.favicon_range: Favicon URL must be under 500 characters
site_info.footer_range: Footer text must be under 255 characters
site_info.icp_range: ICP number must be under 100 characters

personal_info.avatar_range: Avatar URL must be under 500 characters
personal_info.hero_range: Hero banner URL must be under 500 characters

smtp.host_range: SMTP host is required and must be under 255 characters
smtp.port_range: Port must be an integer between 1 and 65535
smtp.username_range: SMTP username is required and must be under 255 characters
smtp.password_range: SMTP password is required and must be under 255 characters
smtp.sender_email_invalid: Please enter a valid sender email
smtp.sender_name_range: Sender name must be under 100 characters
